original_text: So Miriam was shut outside the camp seven days, and the people did not set out on the march till Miriam was brought in again.
korean_text: 이에 미리암이 진영 밖에 이레 동안 갇혀 있었고 백성은 그를 다시 들어오게 하기까지 행진하지 아니하다가

sentences.original_text: So Miriam was shut outside the camp
and the people did not set out on the march
till Miriam was brought in again
